title: The Florians can receive the benefits of food stamps if their power is cut off during Hurricane Irma.
subtitle: A series of Facebook rumors about the benefits of florida's food stamps after Irma have an atom of truth for them but hands are important facts.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The inhabitants of Florida affected by Hurricane Irma can receive $197 in the form of a food stamp, but only if they can prove that their homes have lost electricity for more than two hours.
